description: Another Crab's Treasure is an underwater souls-like with a charming art style and a quirky sense of humor.

0.1.1.description: First public release of the ACT AP randomizer
0.1.1.title: Another Crabs Treasure v0.1.1 Release

0.1.3.description:
Fixed already obtained pickups respawning on a reload.

Known Issues: Fork is invisible when received until entering a loading zone or Moon Snail Shell, otherwise fork works as intended.
0.1.3.title: Another Crabs Treasure v0.1.3 Hotfix

0.1.4.description:
- Fixed Fishing Line Location not sending check
- Fixed various missing locations
- Potential Fix for Skill Purchase locations
0.1.4.title: Another Crabs Treasure v0.1.4 Hotfix

0.1.5.description:
Additions
- Teleport to Start button
- Pearl item now initiates fall of Slacktide

Fixes
- Invisible MSS in Moon Snail Cave
- Shark Egg sending Shelleport
- Bosses still giving adaptations on kill
- Logic, settings, and missing locations
0.1.5.title: Another Crabs Treasure v0.1.5 Patch

0.2.0.description:
NOTICE:
The installation process has changed. Now all necessary files for the plugin are packaged inside of the .dll, please delete any old folders or plugins of this mod before installing the new version.

New Features
 - Deathlink
 - Auto-skips Tutorials
 - Pristine Pearl displays instructions on how to progress
 - Microplastic multiplier option

Fixes
 - "LOC:" text removed from areas it appears in
 - Moon Snail Domain MSS now properly activates after buying the first skill and can be teleported to
 - Fishing Line pickup is no longer despawns if the ability is unlocked or if in fallen Slacktide
 - Moon Snail refund skills are now always available after buying the first skill
 - Moon Snail refund skills now refund the AP purchases rather than getting rid of the received skills
 - Boss 'speed kill' tricks should now properly send checks
 - Teleport to Start button now only appears after unlocking the Cave of Respite MSS
 - Pristine Pearl now properly activates the fall of Slacktide after the player saves > goes to main menu > and clicks continue
 - Certain menu options are no longer locked behind having the Fork unlocked (notably the save button)
 - Fallen Slacktide no longer despawns the ghost Moon Snail that gives the player MSG
 - Debug key binds now only function in debug mode (whoops)
 - Fixed save and auto-save sometimes not writing to file
 - Fixed various logic-related issues
 - Fixed a few items not sending location checks
0.2.0.title: Another Crabs Treasure v0.2.0 Release

0.2.1.description:
Fixes
 - Receiving Umami crystals can cause the game to glitch out
 - Microplastic mod would apply to any instance of gained microplastics, which could lead to infinite money exploits. 
        - Now, the microplastic multiplier only applies to enemy drops and selling currency claws
0.2.1.title: Another Crabs Treasure v0.2.1 Hotfix

0.3.0.description:
**Combat Logic**
Introduces logic that ensures the player has the means to deal damage with varying difficulty levels

- Allow Forkless Disabled: Makes sure the player has the fork before any combat is required in logic
- Enabled Easy: Makes sure the player has a damage-dealing Adaptation/Shellspell as well as a means of regaining Umami
- Enabled Hard: Also accounts for rolling attack and summon strategies

**Shell Rando**
Shells can be randomized between types, e.g. all Thimble shells being replaced with Snow Globes

- Soda Can is always replaced by a shell that can be used for combat logic
- The Spark Plug shell will always be randomized before Scuttleport

**Traps**
Players can now replace a percentage of their filler items with detrimental traps of various effects

- Gunk, Scour, Bleach, and Fear traps apply their respective status effects onto the player
- Clutz trap makes the player drop their shell and unequip their stowaways
- Text trap causes messages to appear on the screen and obscure the player's view
- Shell Shatter trap breaks the player's currently equipped shell
- Poison Cocktail trap applies a few random status effects onto the player
- Taser trap causes the player to be electrocuted

This release also contains various bug fixes and adjustments to the logics progression
0.3.0.title: Another Crabs Treasure v0.3.0 Release

0.3.1.description:
**Fixes**

- Going Under 64 Shell did not spawn properly
- The Fork Location option would not place the Fork in the vanilla location when the option was selected
- The Fishing Line Location option would cause generation errors if placed in the vanilla location
- The Plug Shell would cause an infinite generation loop if placed in an inaccessible location
- The F Key Shell at Shellfish Desires would not be properly randomized
- Shells dropped by enemies would not be properly randomized
- The umami tutorial crab was not accounted for in logic
- Skill received did not have any visual given to the player
- Traps were not triggering at all
- Shells dropped by the player upon death would sometimes get randomized or disappear
- The Plug shell will now be insured if the player has it randomized in their shop
- Costume items could be in the item pool multiple times each
- Logic based around rolling shells did not account for every shell that can roll

There are more issues I am aware of but I wanted to get this out so that the current experience is more complete and stable.
0.3.1.title: Another Crabs Treasure v0.3.1 Hotfix

0.4.0.description:
**Features**
- Player Coordinates are now displayed on the in-game UI
- Fallen Slacktide toggle added to the in-game UI
- Goal option now functional with additional goals
   - Home: Complete the game as normal
   - Roland: Defeat Roland on the pin barge, logically the same as Home but cuts out the final few areas.
   - Voltai: Defeat Voltai in Scuttleport, removes the Eelectrocute adaptation as a requirement for beating the game.
   - Magista: Defeat Magista in Slacktide, removes the map pieces as requirements for beating the game. Good for shorter playthroughs.
- Death messages have been added to deathlink. Players will now be sent the reason for your death with unique reasons for each of the games bosses

**Fixes**
- Shell logic is now taken into account even when shells aren't randomized
- Various errors that prevented generation
- Misc logic errors
- Reworked items to prevent generating more items than locations
- Reworked items to allow for filler items to be more randomized and include more traps
- Soda can in umami crab tutorial is now properly randomized
- Shell spawns in umami crab tutorial no longer spawn endlessly
0.4.0.title: Another Crabs Treasure v0.4.0 Release

0.4.1.description:
**Fixes**
- Slotdata not properly being sent to the client
- Boss goals not properly being activated
0.4.1.title: Another Crabs Treasure v0.4.1 Hotfix

0.4.3.description:
**Fixes**
- Text Trap would throw an exception that prevented it from triggering and prevented items following from showing up
- BepInEx would give a warning that it was targeting the wrong version
0.4.3.title: Another Crabs Treasure v0.4.3 Hotfix

0.4.4.description:
## Fixes
- No longer sends out Deathlinks if the option is off in the yaml
0.4.4.title: Another Crabs Treasure v0.4.4 Hotfix
